message: Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your specific needs. This exceptional item holds a significant value of $10,000 to you, and we believe it would greatly enhance your life or business. We are currently offering this remarkable product to you at a special introductory price of $9,500. Please let us know if this offer suits your budget and preferences, so we can proceed with the transaction.
